title: Weave Shadows
data:
{{Obsolete}} {{NISpell |name=Weave Shadows |level=5 |school1={{Summonings}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Rod of shadows]]
|castingnoise=4 |spellnoise=4 }} {{flavour|Weaves a creature from shadows and threads of Abyssal matter. More powerful creatures are summoned with higher power. You can sustain at most four creatures summoned by this spell.}} '''Weave Creatures''' is a spell only accessible through use of a [[rod of shadows]]. Akin to the spell [[Shadow Creatures]], it temporarily creates a random creature (including their full band if possible), yet rather than choose those appropriate to the branch and floor it is cast in the spell will call forth monsters from a given floor of [[The Dungeon]] or, with sufficient power, [[the Depths]]. The floor of the Dungeon or the Depths from which the monsters are taken from scales with spellpower. ==History== *Weave Shadows was removed in [[0.20]], along with the rod of shadows. *Prior to [[0.16]], the spell could not summon monsters from the Depths. *Weave Shadows was added in [[0.14]], as part of the rod of shadows's replacing of the [[rod of demonology]].
